about_the_game:
The protagonist is a cleaner commissioned by a community support center to clean up a trash house in a certain town. There is a rule that garbage must be separated, and when valuables are picked up, they must be sold to second-hand dealers at the highest price possible for the sake of the landlord.
In this town, there are sloppy landlords who trash one house after another and show you their TVs, but if you stay there for any length of time without permission, you are trespassing. Cleaning up garbage without permission is also trespassing. You may also be sued for illegal dumping if you dump garbage in someone else's yard. You may also be charged with embezzlement if you steal money from valuables in the trash that you sold to a vendor.
The police who show up in town, the crows that come by the garbage, the amusing conversations with the townspeople, the bugs that are much fewer than in the previous film (Drink Milk Directly), life in jail, and scratch cards to decorate Matsuyori-san's house with many treasures!
Garbage is divided into burnable, non-burnable, bulky, and recyclable garbage, especially recyclable garbage, etc. Leftover food and drink garbage must be eaten or drunk by you, because crows will come to you if you put out food scraps,
Small trash can go directly into your inventory.
If the inventory is overflowing, the walking speed becomes slow, and garbage that can be drunk can cause stomach problems or, on the contrary, become an energy drink.
Each piece of trash can be held in both hands, so you can play P0AP? You can even stack trash on top of trash to make a building made of trash to play with.

This is real man's work!
detailed_description:
The protagonist is a cleaner commissioned by a community support center to clean up a trash house in a certain town. There is a rule that garbage must be separated, and when valuables are picked up, they must be sold to second-hand dealers at the highest price possible for the sake of the landlord.
In this town, there are sloppy landlords who trash one house after another and show you their TVs, but if you stay there for any length of time without permission, you are trespassing. Cleaning up garbage without permission is also trespassing. You may also be sued for illegal dumping if you dump garbage in someone else's yard. You may also be charged with embezzlement if you steal money from valuables in the trash that you sold to a vendor.
The police who show up in town, the crows that come by the garbage, the amusing conversations with the townspeople, the bugs that are much fewer than in the previous film (Drink Milk Directly), life in jail, and scratch cards to decorate Matsuyori-san's house with many treasures!
Garbage is divided into burnable, non-burnable, bulky, and recyclable garbage, especially recyclable garbage, etc. Leftover food and drink garbage must be eaten or drunk by you, because crows will come to you if you put out food scraps,
Small trash can go directly into your inventory.
If the inventory is overflowing, the walking speed becomes slow, and garbage that can be drunk can cause stomach problems or, on the contrary, become an energy drink.
Each piece of trash can be held in both hands, so you can play P0AP? You can even stack trash on top of trash to make a building made of trash to play with.

This is real man's work!
name: EFGH Escape from Garbage House 【ゴミ屋敷脱出ゲーム】

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EFGH Escape from Garbage House 【ゴミ屋敷脱出ゲーム】

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-750
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-4790
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: optical line recommended

short_description: Cleaners undertake the cleanup with a physical operation that involves dumping trash with both hands. Depending on your attitude toward the job, you may get crows or police visits Clean the house through conversation!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish
*languages with full audio support
